lead_paragraph: President Denis Sassou-Nguesso has won a new five-year term with more than 60 percent of the vote, the interior minister said, but the opposition rejected the outcome.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Congo Republic: President Is Re-elected

snippet: President Denis Sassou-Nguesso has won a new five-year term with more than 60 percent of the vote, the interior minister said, but the opposition rejected the outcome.
abstract: Pres Denis Sassou-Nguesso of Republic of Congo wins new five-year term, but opposition rejects outcome, citing fraud and calling for protests.
